description: Following EP 1 on First Day of School, this heartwarming sequel dives into the excitement and nerves of the first day of school and we kids handle the challenges. Join our young guests, Fifi & Miranda, as they share their stories about handling those first-day jitters, meeting new classmates, and finding ways to feel brave in a brand-new environment (without mommies!). From funny moments to heartfelt advice, these kids remind us that starting something new is always easier when we have a smile and a little courage. Whether youâ€™re heading back to school or reminiscing about your own first-day experiences, this episode is sure to bring a smile to your face!
